name: Spacefaust
description:
Defend the tiny planet by destroying the invaders. You may boast before each round to make things harder for yourself.

WASD to move; release and re-press to dash
Mouse to look
Left-click to shoot lasers
Right-click to shoot missiles (have cooldown)
1, 2, 3 keys to enable boasts at start of round

Each boast you take on will increase the number of beneficial structures generated should you survive the round.
